scripts.setup: npm run ats:setup && npm run mass-payout:setup
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol
scripts.clean:deps:
rimraf packages/*/node_modules packages/*/*/node_modules apps/*/node_modules apps/*/*/node_modules node_modules && echo '
✅ Dependency files cleaned (package-lock.json preserved)'
scripts.clean:deps:full:
npm run clean:deps && rimraf package-lock.json && echo '
✅ All dependency files have been cleaned (including package-lock.json)'
scripts.ats:setup: npm run ats:clean && npm ci && npm run ats:build
scripts.ats:setup:clean: npm run ats:clean && npm install && npm run ats:build
scripts.ats:build: npm run ats:contracts:build && npm run ats:sdk:build && npm run ats:web:build
scripts.ats:test: npm run ats:contracts:test && npm run ats:sdk:test && npm run ats:web:test
scripts.ats:test:ci: npm run ats:contracts:test:ci && npm run ats:sdk:test:ci && npm run ats:web:test:ci
scripts.ats:lint: npm run ats:lint:js && npm run ats:lint:sol
scripts.ats:start: npm ci && npm run ats:contracts:build && npm run ats:sdk:build && npm run ats:web:dev
scripts.ats:clean:
npm run ats:contracts:clean && npm run ats:sdk:clean && npm run ats:web:clean && npm run clean:deps && echo '
✅ All ATS compilation, build and similar files have been cleaned'
scripts.ats:publish: npm run ats:contracts:publish && npm run ats:sdk:publish
scripts.ats:contracts:test:ci: npm run test:ci --workspace=packages/ats/contracts --if-present || npm run test --workspace=packages/ats/contracts
scripts.ats:sdk:test:ci: npm run test:ci --workspace=packages/ats/sdk --if-present || npm run test --workspace=packages/ats/sdk
scripts.mass-payout:build: npm run build --workspace=packages/mass-payout/* && npm run build --workspace=apps/mass-payout/* --if-present
scripts.mass-payout:test: npm run test --workspace=packages/mass-payout/* && npm run test --workspace=apps/mass-payout/* --if-present
scripts.mass-payout:start: npm run mass-payout:build && npm run mass-payout:dev
scripts.mass-payout:clean:
npm run clean --workspace=packages/mass-payout/* --if-present && npm run clean --workspace=apps/mass-payout/* --if-present && echo '
✅ All mass-payout compilation and build files have been cleaned'
